title: The Beginning
description: Until now, Ravyn Wyng has led a normal life. She is a successful author, married to a great wife, and has wonderful friends. Lately her sleep is plagued by strange dreams and when a box arrives containing journals written in an old language, a copper disk, and a ring, normalcy goes out the window. 105,723 Words. Also includes extra short pieces, character interviews, and excerpts from my other books.
author: Anna Dobritt
